projects.name: HaveFun(d)
details: Built for ETHGlobal Bangkok Hackathon competition, HaveFun(d) is an innovative platform designed to simplify fundraising on Web3.
Developed a seamless integration of Web3 with Web2 payment options, allowing contributors to use their credit cards to support fundraising projects.
The destination chain for fundraisers is Hedera, ensuring secure and efficient handling of transactions.

projects.name: Camping booking system(Backend Development)
details: This is a project that I developed during my studies in the 'Software Backend Development' subject
Purpose of this project is to create a camping booking system that allows users to book camping spots and manage their bookings.
Using Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB, I developed a RESTful API that enables users to create, read, update, and delete bookings and spots.

projects.name: Android Call Log Creator
details: Developed a React Native application using the Expo framework to generate random phone call activities.
Implemented features allowing users to specify the start and end dates for generating call logs.
Each generated call activity includes a random duration and a timestamp that falls within the specified date range.

projects.name: Swine fat measurement by using computer vision (Senior Project)
details: Designed and implemented an intuitive ReactJS/Next.js interface to simplify swine fat measurement processes.
Streamlined model performance by carefully cleaning and sourcing data directly from swine production lines.

projects.name: Wordpress application automation deployment
details: Automated Wordpress website deployment on AWS using Terraform, streamlining infrastructure management.

projects.name: PlayHub
details: Designed and developed a web application using React and TypeScript on NextJS Framework to connect individuals interested in playing board games.
Led responsibilities in UX/UI design and front-end development.
Assist in project management, including analyzing and designing detailed systems. Carry out system development, follow the testing plan, and manage implementation and decommissioning plans.
Edit and enhance existing .NET code based on requirements, ensuring functionality aligns with system specifications.
Customized Strapi CMS (open-source) for internal TTB Bank use, enhancing content management efficiency.
Applied Git, Agile methodologies, React, and Node.js to deliver robust web solutions.
Performed unit testing with Jest to ensure code quality and reliability.
Utilized LoadRunner to assess application speed, scalability, and stability under diverse conditions, ensuring it met performance standards for an optimal user experience.
Analyzed the working time of employees in each team to measure task allocation efficiency and ensure appropriate task time management.

certificates.title: Google Cloud Skill Boost
certificates.description: Earned multiple badges through Google Cloud Skill Boost, demonstrating proficiency in infrastructure building with Terraform and language processing with ML. Highlights include expertise in AI and machine learning, generative AI with Vertex AI, and baseline infrastructure (GCP) setup.

certificates.title: Google Data Analytics
certificates.description: Completed the Google Data Analytics Professional Certificate, demonstrating proficiency in data preparation, processing, analysis, and visualization using spreadsheets, SQL, Tableau, and R.

certificates.title: ETHGlobal Bangkok Hackathon
certificates.description: Participated in ETHGlobal Bangkok Hackathon competition, building 'HaveFun(d)'—a fundraising platform with Web3 and Web2 integration, utilizing Hedera as the destination chain.

certificates.title: EthPadThai BootCamp
certificates.description: Bootcamp for individuals interested in Web3, covering basic blockchain knowledge and programming smart contracts.
